name: Dodger Dog
description:
//-DODGER DOG-\\

Created for itch.io Dog Jam, 15-17 July 2017.
Developed by Luke and Ben Herbert.

Installation:
Before you run dodgergame.exe please install the fonts provided in the fonts folder. If the Silkscreen
fonts are not installed the game becomes unreadable and messy so please use them. 

Controls:
Arrow keys to control Dodger's movement.

ANY QUESTIONS OR CONCERNS, TWEET OR EMAIL ME!

Twitter: @misterlukeherb
@littlepiekid
E-Mail: lukeherbat@gmail.com

Requires a Windows computer and DirectX to run, sorry Linux and Mac users :(
